articles.title: American Airlines rebooks mom on flight leaving days before young sons
articles.description: Sarah Ripmaster had to spend hours on the phone with American Airlines to get her sons on the same rebooked flight or face leaving them behind.
articles.content:

But then an email from American Airlines changed everything.
